column4: i upgraded from 11.04 to 11.10. Now when i log in i just can see the wallpaper but anythin i click or do is not displayed. is some kind of graphical problem with unity?
how can ido that? remember i can just use CLI
click the round icon next to your name ( settings )
whatever i click is useless, i just get the starting screen, the wallpaper in the background and that all
oh you dont even see the login site?
i get to the login screen, i log in and then i can just see the wallpaper and the left bar, if i click them ican see the mouse cursor change but nothing happens
that login window you do get to, right next to your username and password is a cog icon
ok, what can i do there?
isent there something called "ubuntu 2D" or classic etc?
there " i fix it" but id really like to use ubuntu at it best
now its working, how can i use the other ubuntu? what does it has?
then you have to fix compiz
i cant help you there, i have never used compiz myself
but i have tested if compiz can run on my machine.. passes all tests... but if i try to login to ubuntu with it enabled i wount be able to login either.. i guess the ubuntu devs failed that one
oic, let me log in from the other PC. tia
